OverviewPage.label: About
OverviewPage.title: Overview
OverviewPage.scopeDescription: EBISION {year} aims to publish high quality papers that are closely related to various theories and practical applications in E-Business Information Systems to highlight the state-of-art research. The symposium welcomes papers which are related to emerging technologies and their impact on E-Business ecosystems, digital transformation, and the future of information systems.
OverviewPage.impactDescription: We expect that EBISION {year} will be a catalyst for further research and technology improvements related to this important subject, fostering collaboration between academia and industry in addressing the challenges and opportunities of the digital great transformation.
OverviewPage.ctaDescription: Download the complete Call for Papers document for detailed submission guidelines, topics of interest, and important deadlines.

AwardRecipientsPage.emptyTitle: Roll of Honors will be announced soon
AwardRecipientsPage.emptyDescription: The Roll of Honors for EBISION {year} will be announced after the conference. Please check back later for updates.

AnnouncementPage.label: Announcement
AnnouncementPage.title: Awards Nomination
AnnouncementPage.subtitle: EBISION {year} invites nominations for awards recognizing outstanding contributions to research, service, and academic leadership within the field of E-Business Information Systems.
AnnouncementPage.submissionDescription: Nominations can be submitted directly through the EBISION online portal. Click the button below to access the portal.
AnnouncementPage.attendanceNote: All award recipients must register for and attend EBISION {year} at {venue}, {location} ({dates}) to receive recognition.
AnnouncementPage.ctaDescription: For questions about the nomination process, please contact the EBISION {year} cyber chair

ContactPage.label: Get in Touch
ContactPage.title: Contact Us
ContactPage.subtitle: Have questions about EBISION {year}? Reach out to our organizing committee for assistance with submissions, registration, or general inquiries.
ContactPage.generalInquiriesDescription: For questions about the conference, submissions, registration, or any other inquiries, please contact the EBISION {year} cyber chair.
ContactPage.responseNote: We look forward to hearing from you and will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible.
ContactPage.ctaDescription: Submit your research to EBISION {year} and join leading researchers in advancing E-Business Information Systems.
